name: NEON JUMPS (Yeski)
description:
NEON JUMPS is a short puzzel in wich you have to navigate through each level in order to complete it. 

But you only have 3 jumps so use them wisesly!

Controls: Arrow keys to move. R to restart and space to jump

Unfortunately i wasn't able to add 10 levels due to some personal problems.

Hope you enjoy!
